snippet: Stocks traded just slightly higher in New York after Greek leaders agreed to cost-cutting measures aimed at preventing the country from defaulting on its debt next month.
abstract: Stocks rise modestly for a third consecutive day after Greece reaches a deal to secure a financial bailout; investors remain cautious after a week of gains.
lead_paragraph: Stocks traded just slightly higher in New York after Greek leaders agreed to cost-cutting measures aimed at preventing the country from defaulting on its debt next month.

headline.main: Markets Remain Cautious on Greek Developments
headline.print_headline: Markets Remain Cautious On Greek Developments
